snippet: “Rev.,” about an Anglican church in London, and “The Yard,” about Toronto schoolchildren, provide satire whose bite is cushioned by gentleness.
abstract: Mike Hale compares British television show Rev with Canadian mini-series The Yard, both making their American debuts online at Hulu.com.
lead_paragraph: “Rev.,” about an Anglican church in London, and “The Yard,” about Toronto schoolchildren, provide satire whose bite is cushioned by gentleness.

headline.seo: ‘Rev.’ and ‘The Yard,’ Two Short Series on Hulu
headline.main: Tough Times at the Playground and the Church
headline.print_headline: Tough Times at the Playground and the Church
